meanings.definition: Having a particular style or design.
meanings.sent1: The stylate dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her stylate artwork was displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The stylate haircut made him look like a famous actor.
meanings.sent4: The stylate room resembled a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The stylate car was the envy of the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To give a particular style or design to something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to stylate her room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: The designer stylated the website to make it more appealing.
meanings.sent3: He tried to stylate his sandwich with fancy toothpicks.
meanings.sent4: The artist stylated the painting with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: They stylated the garden with unique sculptures.
